1.0.name: wordpress/smaf
1.0.description:
SMAF use Contact Form 7 plugin for sending attached files from attachment page to users via email.

Recommended Plugins

The following are other recommended plugins by the author of SMAF.

  • Contact Form 7 - Required plugin for SMAF(required).
  • Really Simple CAPTCHA - Really Simple CAPTCHA is a simple CAPTCHA module which works well with(optional).

Translators
